ADDENDUM

If rny emendation of Catull. 54. z. hara es, rustice, is right, it receives some confirmation from Cic, in Pis.ยง 37, confer te nunc, Epicure noster, ex hara producte, mm a schoht, confer, si audes, absentiam tuam cum ntea.
